data.reasoning: Chipotle's menu contains items that can be prepared gluten-free. However, the risk of cross-contamination is significant due to shared preparation areas and equipment. The menu itself highlights certain 'Lifestyle Bowls' as gluten-free, which suggests some awareness. The OCR menu mentions flour tortillas, which pose a direct cross-contamination risk. Reviews do not offer any insights into safety practices or staff knowledge. There's insufficient evidence to confirm dedicated gluten-free preparation procedures.
risk_factors: Unknown staff training regarding gluten allergies
safe_alternatives: Burrito Bowl with corn tortillas (if available and confirmed)
Lifestyle Bowls labeled 'Gluten Free' (ensure no modifications that introduce gluten)
Salad with appropriate toppings (confirm no cross-contamination during preparation)
